room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Escapeburg in New York
review: This is hands down the best escape room I've been to. My group did the Egyptian room and we were all really impressed by both the puzzles and the production value. The puzzles were innovative and challenging, but never felt overwhelming. The set design was almost movie studio quality. I definitely plan on checking out the other rooms when they open.

room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Escapeburg in New York
review: This was our 5th escape room and definitely one of the best. Challenging, well thought out riddles, and well executed too. Great experience, highly recommend! Will be back when they open the new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Escapeburg in New York
review: This is the next level of escape rooms no locks all technology. Full of immersion, puzzles are homemade and one of a kind. I felt like indiana jones adventuring through trying to push through each puzzle. Highly recommend, the price is well worth it. The gamemasters are super friendly and helpful, would not have it anyother way.
